ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Gammarus fasciatus 110 ug/L/96 hr at 15 °C, mature (95% confidence limit 80-150 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Gammarus lacustris 56 ug/L/96 hr at 15 °C, mature (95% confidence limit 40-78 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Pteronarcys californica 4.1 ug/L/96 hr at 15 °C, second yr class (95% confidence limit 3.4-5.0 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Salmo clarki (cutthroat trout) 640 ug/L/96 hr at 13 °C, wt 1.0 g (95% confidence limit 550-740 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (rainbow trout) 1,250 ug/L/96 hr at 13 °C, wt 0.9 g (95% confidence limit 1,040-1,500 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Ictalurus punctatus (channel catfish) 4,800 ug/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.1 g (95% confidence limit 4,400-5,240 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill) 1,230 ug/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.3 g (95% confidence limit 1,070-1,390 ug/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 100%/
LC50 Micropterus salmoides (largemouth bass) 840 ug/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 0.7 g /Technical material, 100%, Tested in hard water, 272 ppm calcium carbonate/
LC50 Stizostedion vitreum vitreum (walleye) 800 ug/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.3 g (95% confidence limit 730-880 ug/L) /Technical material, 100 %, Tested in hard water, 272 ppm calcium carbonate/
